subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Dallas owner Jerry Jones was dejected after the Cowboys made a bagful of regretful second-half plays that made 27-20 winners of the Giants on Sunday. But he still has hope for the playoffs.
snippet: Dallas owner Jerry Jones was dejected after the Cowboys made a bagful of regretful second-half plays that made 27-20 winners of the Giants on Sunday. But he still has hope for the playoffs.
